results.title: Magic of a Common Sugar Pill in Cancer: Can Metformin Raise Survival in Pancreatic Cancer Patients?
results.text_hl: However, results regarding the survival benefit of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010190 @@@pancreatic cancer@@@ have been unpredictable.

results.title: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Intersects With Pancreatic Cancer Diagnosis and Development
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ offers a clear benefit of inhibiting @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010190 @@@PC@@@, whereas @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ therapy may increase the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010190 @@@PC@@@ development.

results.title: The Role of Type 2 Diabetes in Pancreatic Cancer
results.text_hl: Antidiabetic drugs can have various effects on the occurrence and prognosis of @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010190 @@@PC@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ offering a clear benefit of inhibiting @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010190 @@@PC@@@ and @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ increasing the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010190 @@@PC@@@.
